body_html: Another thing: in your next PR (as I know you're working more on this later, but we want to have a first version up), could you move all the old application_some_random_title.png files that are currently in the app/assets/images/pages to app/assets/images/pages/help which you just created? that way all files are in the same spot. I'm pretty sure those files are just used on the help pages :)

body: Another thing: in your next PR (as I know you're working more on this later, but we want to have a first version up), could you move all the old `application_some_random_title.png` files that are currently in the `app/assets/images/pages` to `app/assets/images/pages/help` which you just created? that way all files are in the same spot. I'm pretty sure those files are just used on the help pages :)
